Key Match Events: Aaron Judge hit a go-ahead grand slam in the seventh inning off left-hander Cam Booser for his Major League-leading 52nd homer.
Post-Match Reflections: Yankees' manager Aaron Boone noted the dugout and Yankee Stadium erupted after Judge's slam.
Judge's performance gave him 130 RBIs, one shy of his career high of 131 set during his 2022 AL MVP campaign.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Aaron Judge had not homered since Aug. 25 against the Rockies.
The Yankees are now three games up on the Orioles in the American League East, their largest division lead since June 14.
